    • fromCredentialHash

      public static MessageEnvelope<HcsVcMessage> fromCredentialHash​(java.lang.String credentialHash, HcsVcOperation operation)
      Creates a new VC message for submission to HCS topic.
      Parameters:
      credentialHash - VC hash.
      operation - The operation on a VC document.
      Returns:
      The HCS message wrapped in an envelope for the given VC and operation.

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Checks if the message is valid from content point of view. Does not verify hash nor any signatures.
      Returns:
      True if the message is valid and False otherwise.
